name: Skuldugery
overview: Skuldugery is a 2D top-down maze game. The player controls a genie, and must find various valuable treasures in an old maze (castle, labyrinth and forest), haunted by living skulls. The genie is completely defenceless - when the skull attacks the player, he loses items. The game uses very non-typical controls - player moves genie and screen independently, by using 2 sets of keys.
